title: Start A Blessing | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Start A Blessing | Joel Osteen
description:
The decisions we make don’t just affect our lives, they affect the legacy we leave behind. When you make decisions that honor God, your faithfulness will be credited to your future generations.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
